title: DragonWeave Thick 3mm Black Leather Gunmetal Cord Necklace
features: black 3mm thick Greek leather cord necklace
dark gunmetal gray ends and lobster claw clasp
huge variety of lengths available, from choker to extra long
description: Bold, classic 3mm thick black leather cord necklace with gunmetal ends and clasp. This thick 3mm black leather necklace features dark gunmetal colored ends and very secure lobster claw clasp. Gunmetal is a dark gray, very popular for men's necklace cords. The black and gunmetal are a great color combination, dark and masculine. The leather is high quality Greek cord, known for it's uniformity and durability, manufactured to be non-toxic and environmentally friendly. Fits any pendant bail that accommodates 4.5mm by 3.5mm. A great necklace cord to wear with larger pendants and charms, but also great to wear on its own. Perfect for everyday use. Available in a large variety of lengths from choker to extra long. Handmade in the USA exclusively by DragonWeave. Comes with a lifetime guarantee.
